items.title: Bulk Deals: VBAP Holdings offloads over 1% stake in Awfis Space Solutions
items.description: VBAP Holdings had held 5.92 percent stake (42.17 lakh shares) in Awfis Space Solutions as of June 2025.

items.title: M&M sticks to SUV growth outlook, expects PLI boost to power EV margins
items.description: M&M share price: Its Q1FY26 SUV revenue market share increased to 27.3 percent from 23.5 percent from the previous quarter, the company's investor presentation showed.

items.title: M&M says 'comfortably covered' on rare earth magnets for the next two quarters
items.description: M&M share price: The management added that Mahindra is covered for the current quarter and the next two, and “mostly covered” for the fourth quarter as well.

items.title: Eastern Silk Industries OFS subscribed over 1,413 times on final day
items.description: Eastern Silk Industries OFS has received bids for 26.5 crore shares against the offer size of 1.87 lakh shares, the subscription data on the NSE showed.

items.title: Abbott India reboots Digene: old-school antacid, new school vibe
items.description: The pharma firm is making over the famed antacid, with Digene Insta On The Go, a single-dose, water-free stick pack leading the change

items.title: Top Gainers & Losers: Stocks that moved the most on July 30
items.description: Indian stock markets ended the session on a flat note today, with benchmark indices closing in the green with marginal gains.

items.title: Bharti Airtel shares gain 0.61% in today's session
items.description: Shares of Bharti Airtel were trading at Rs 1,930 in Wednesday's session.

items.title: Markets end marginally higher ahead of US Fed rate verdict
items.description: In stock-specific action, Larsen & Toubro was among the top performers, rising 5 percent after its first-quarter earnings exceeded expectations. In contrast, Tata Motors declined nearly 3 percent following reports that the company plans to acquire Italian truck manufacturer Iveco in a deal valued at around $4.5 billion.

items.title: Live: Nifty extends gaining streak to second day, above 24,850 | Closing Bell
items.description: Nifty Extends Gain To Second Day. Sensex Rises Over 200 Pts, India Vix Eases 2%. Broader Markets Continue To Underperform. Auto, Bank, Realty Stocks Sulk The Most. It, FMCG Stocks Support Market Upside. Nifty 50 Gainers: L&T, NTPC, Tata Consumer. Nifty 50 Losers: Tata Motors, Hero Moto, Eternal. Join Lovisha Darad and Yatin Mota as they break down the week’s market action and highlight stocks to watch.

items.title: Larsen & Toubro shares surge 4.90%; stock among top gainers on Nifty 50
items.description: The positive movement of Larsen & Toubro shares underscores its strong market presence.
